content.question: Synthesize material from at least three of the sources and incorporate it into a coherent, well-written essay in which you develop your position on the role, if any, that alternatives to national currencies should play in the future.

frqParts.text: Synthesize material from at least three of the sources and incorporate it into a coherent, well-written essay in which you develop your position on the role, if any, that alternatives to national currencies should play in the future.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
